Information From the Restaurant Offers
Description: Starbuck's Coffee is a Coffee&Tea , Breakfast , and Fast Food restaurant where most Menuism users came for a meal on the go , paid less than $10 , and tipped less than 15% . Tags: Coffee&Tea, Breakfast, Fast Food, Delivery, American, Coffee, and Tea Stats: 351 dishes entered by diners at Starbuck's Coffee Tips: Purchase a Starbucks customer card and use it to receive fun rewards, like a free tall beverage when you buy a pound of coffee beans. The Starbucks logo, a two-tailed mermaid, was based on a 16th century Norse woodcut, and supposed to be as seductive as coffee itself.
Nothing yet.
Do you own Starbuck's Coffee? Contact us to connect with your diners.

Reviews for Starbuck's Coffee Write a review 1 review First reviewed by FordF150STX
0 helpful votes over 1 review FordF150STX 1 Restaurant Review 0
Add as friend Send Msg Starbuck's Coffee FordF150STX May 9, 2011 3.0 3.0 star rating 0 0 0 0 Votes Drive thru Tips
Good guest service, good drinks, but I feel like I get robbed every time I go there, the teller almost always try to keep my change for the drinks, even five dollars or more. I don’t pay an extra five bucks for pouring a cup of coffee.
Dishes I tried:
Coffee of the Day
3.0 star rating
A little bitter, but strong coffee. Link To Review
